segments.text: I'd like to open a savings account . Can you tell me how to do it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . You have to fill out this form and let me see three identification cards or documents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a driver's licence , a membership card and my passport . Will they do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see them . Yes , they're OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the minimum amount I can deposit in an account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can deposit an initial amount of ten dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
